src.java.org.codehaus.grails.portlets.container
Interface PortletContainerAdapter

interface PortletContainerAdapter

Provides container agnositc access to the underlying ServletContext and ServletConfig.

author:
Kenji Nakamura
since:
0.2

Method Summary
HttpServletRequest getHttpServletRequest(PortletRequest portletRequest)

Returns the underlying HttpServletRequest.

HttpServletResponse getHttpServletResponse(PortletResponse portletResponse)

Returns the underlying HttpServletResponse.

ServletConfig getServletConfig(PortletConfig config)

Returns the underlying ServletConfig

ServletContext getServletContext(PortletContext context)

Returns the underlying ServletContext portlet context
